name: Cursed Adventure
description:
Download the game for the best experience. If you decide to play on your browser, enable hardware acceleration for a smoother experience!

This is a submission for the Kenney Jam 2020 game jam. The theme was "Cursed"

I recommend you playing until you see the ending!

Description: 

All of the sudden you wake up in a cursed world! There's an adventurer who claims to be a "princess", who guides you on how to lift the curse! No human has ever succeeded lifting the curse!

You try to find what cursed the world. Turns out to be a duck! You must defeat him in order to lift the curse and make everything normal again. But... can you really do it?

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow - Move left/right

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact

X - Attack
